attention.description: The attention level of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

meditation.description: The meditation level of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

delta.description: Delta wave activity of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

theta.description: Theta wave activity of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

lowAlpha.description: Low alpha wave activity of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

highAlpha.description: High alpha wave activity of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

lowBeta.description: Low beta wave activity of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

highBeta.description: High beta wave activity of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

lowGamma.description: Low gamma wave activity of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

highGamma.description: High gamma wave activity of the driver, measured by EEG brainwave. It has no specific unit.

classification.description: The classification result of whether the driver is sleepy or not. 0 indicates not sleepy, 1 indicates sleepy.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in analyzing EEG brainwave data.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the EEG brainwave data of the driver, please predict whether the driver is sleepy or not.
prompt.answer_prompt: The driver is not sleepy[0] or the driver is sleepy[1]?

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in analyzing EEG brainwave data.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the EEG brainwave data of the driver, please predict the attention level.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in analyzing EEG brainwave data.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the EEG brainwave data of the driver, please predict the meditation level.
